mapper.update: update SYS_ROLES_AUTHORITIES set (ID, ROLE_ID, AUTHORITY_ID,ENABLED) = ( #{id}, #{roleId}, #{authorityId},#{enabled javaType="Boolean" jdbcType="CHAR" } )
mapper.select: select ur.ID,ur.AUTHORITY_ID,ur.ROLE_ID,r.AUTHORITY_DESC from SYS_ROLES_AUTHORITIES ur left join SYS_AUTHORITIES r on ur.AUTHORITY_ID = r.AUTHORITY_ID where ur.ROLE_ID =#{id} union select ur.ID, CONCAT(ur.APP_ID,'') AS AUTHORITY_ID,ur.ROLE_ID,r.CATAGORY_NAME AS AUTHORITY_DESC from SYS_ROLE_APP ur left join PORTAL_CATAGORY r on ur.APP_ID = r.ID where ur.ROLE_ID =#{id}
